QuestData.Title: Abyssion's Minions
QuestData.Description: If it's the dragon that's got the fragment, we're going to need to draw his attention back to his den.$B$BGo to Abyssion's Lair just east of here and defeat his underlings. That should get him to show up with the World Pillar fragment sooner or later.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 8 Twilight or Dragonkin units at Abyssion's Lair.
QuestData.RewardText: That ought to get the dragon's attention, $n.
